Class LevelThree

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
com.example.demo.levels.LevelParent
com.example.demo.levels.LevelThree
public class LevelThree extends LevelParent
Represents the third level of the game, featuring a challenging boss fight.

Key Features:

  • Introduces a boss enemy with dynamic health, shield, and position updates.
  • Objective: Defeat the boss to complete the level.
  • Custom UI elements for boss health and shield visibility.

      Specified by:
      initializeFriendlyUnits in class LevelParent

    • checkIfGameOver

      protected void checkIfGameOver()
      Checks if the game is over based on the player's or boss's state.
      • If the player's health is zero, the game ends with a loss.
      • If the boss is defeated, the game ends with a win.
      Specified by:
      checkIfGameOver in class LevelParent

    • spawnEnemyUnits

      protected void spawnEnemyUnits()
      Spawns the boss enemy if no enemies are currently present. Ensures the boss is added to the list of enemies for gameplay tracking.
      Specified by:
      spawnEnemyUnits in class LevelParent

    • updateLevelView

      protected void updateLevelView()
      Updates the level view, including health bars, shields, and boss position. Synchronizes the boss's shield visibility and position with the UI.
      Overrides:
      updateLevelView in class LevelParent

    • adjustBossPosition

      public void adjustBossPosition()
      Adjusts the position of the boss dynamically based on screen dimensions. Ensures the boss is centered vertically and positioned near the right edge.

    • updateBossShieldPosition

      public void updateBossShieldPosition(double bossX, double bossY)
      Updates the position of the boss's shield relative to its location.
      Parameters:
      bossX - the X-coordinate of the boss
      bossY - the Y-coordinate of the boss
